While it has its minor quirks, the blend of safety, design, and performance makes it a strong value-for-money option in its price range. Would we recommend it? Absolutely! It has spacious seating, robust performance, entertainment options with signature Mahindra safety features, which are crafted for superior quality. In this article, you will get to know all its features, which are designed to enhance your thrill of driving the SUV at an affordable price. Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications: Exterior The Mahindra XUV 3XO exterior catches everyones attention in a blink. Its powerful stance signifies energy, style, and sportiness. In the front, the bold grille, sharp, sleek LED headlamps, and daytime running lights present a strong facade. The correctly designed hood, dynamic character lines along the sides, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels present a robust silhouette. At the rear, the innovative connected LED tail lamps, revamped bumper, and roof spoiler enhance its overall aesthetic. With a ground clearance of 201 mm, it triumphs in navigating challenging terrains. Overall, the exterior design depicts that the Mahindra XUV 3XO is well-proportioned. The distinct sportiness makes it ideal for daily commuting or thrilling adventures. Visit your Mahindra Automotive showroom Srikakulam to experience a test drive today. XUV 3XO Interior The interior is carefully designed on a wheelbase of 2,600 mm and measures 3,990(L)x1,821(W)x1,647(H) mm3. As a result, it offers plenty of room for five people, assuring ample legroom and headroom for free activity. The dashboard design is sleek and modern. It is enriched with soft-touch materials and accented by metallic details. The seats are wrapped in leatherette and high-quality fabric to your preference. The sunroof invites fresh air and light, creating a refreshing ambience. Dual 26.03 cm HD infotainment and digital displays provide amusement and essential driving information. The dual-tone interior and the Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system deliver an immersive audio experience, ideal for driving. In addition, the 364-litre* cargo capacity is perfect for adjusting all your luggage. Technology and Comfort The compact SUV crossover boasts an array of advanced tech-savvy features created to make every trip enjoyable. Its 26.03 cm touchscreen infotainment system is equipped with AdrenoX linked vehicle technology, providing effortless access to navigation, music, vehicle details, and remote capabilities. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features Apple CarPlay and Android Auto to connect a smartphone and use its apps. It has a fully digital instrument panel that allows for a personalised display. Additional amenities include dual-zone climate control, wireless charging, a high-end Harman Kardon sound system, as well as electric parking brakes and auto hold functions. Mahindras commitment to comfort is evident with the intelligent keyless entry, numerous USB ports, and powered adjustments for the drivers seat. XUV 3XO Performance & Mileage The vehicle offers an array of engine choices that connect various individuals across India. 📊 COMPREHENSIVE Mahindra XUV 3XO Features ANALYSIS REPORT

🎯 Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV that offers a blend of style, comfort, and technology. Key features include its modern design, comfortable interiors, advanced technology, and safety features. The vehicle is available in multiple variants with both petrol and diesel engine options.

🔍 Market Landscape Overview

The Mahindra XUV 3XO competes in the compact SUV segment against rivals such as Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue, and Maruti Suzuki Brezza. It aims to provide a fresh look with updated features and comfort.

💺 Comfort and Interior Features

The interior of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is designed for comfort and sophistication. Key features include:

  • Skyroof: Offers an open and airy feel to the cabin.
  • Soft-touch leatherette: Used on door trims and dashboard for a premium feel.
  • Premium leatherette seats: Provide comfortable seating.
  • Cooled glovebox with illumination: Keeps items cool and easily accessible.
  • Passive keyless entry: Adds convenience for the driver.
  • Front armrest with storage: Offers additional storage space.
  • Console with cup holder: Provides convenience for beverages.

📱 Technology and Connectivity

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is equipped with several smart connectivity and technology features:

  • Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system: Provides an immersive audio experience.
  • High-definition touchscreen system: For infotainment and navigation.
  • Built-in Amazon Alexa: For entertainment and voice control.
  • ADRENOX Connect technology: Allows control of car functions via smartphone.
  • 10.25-inch infotainment display: Paired with a 10.25-inch digital instrument cluster.
  • Wireless charging: Adds convenience for charging devices.

🛡️ Safety Features

The Mahindra XUV 3XO prioritizes safety with the following features:

  • Six airbags: For enhanced protection.
  • Five-star Global NCAP safety rating: Ensures high safety standards.
  • ABS with EBD: Enhances braking performance.
  • Electronic stability control: Provides stability during driving.
  • Tyre pressure monitoring: Alerts the driver of low tyre pressure.
  • Level 2 ADAS: Includes features like forward collision warning and adaptive cruise control.

🚗 Exterior Design

The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a modern and athletic exterior design:

  • Chrome accents: On the grille and headlamp finish.
  • Projector headlamps with LED DRLs: Enhances visibility and aesthetics.
  • Diamond-cut alloy wheels: Adds a premium feel to the vehicle.
  • Roof rails & spoilers: Gloss-black roof rails and a sleek spoiler.
  • 201 mm ground clearance: For driving on rocky terrains.

🔩 Performance and Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a range of engine options:

  • Engine Options:1.2-liter three-cylinder MPFI engine, delivering 109 BHP and 200 Nm of torque.
  • Transmission: Manual and automatic transmissions.
  • Fuel Efficiency: ARAI-certified mileage of 18.5 km/l.

📏 Dimensions and Capacity

The Mahindra XUV 3XO has the following dimensions:

  • Length: 3990 mm
  • Width: 1821 mm
  • Height: 1647 mm
  • Wheelbase: 2600 mm
  • Boot Space: 364 Litres
  • Seating Capacity: 5

In-depth Specification Breakdown The Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications offer a sense of driving in harmony, either on a business trip or on a long journey with friends or family. This subcompact crossover SUV quickly became a travel companion for countless people after its launch. It is powerful, modern, and packed with everything you desire in an SUV. It has spacious seating, robust performance, entertainment options with signature Mahindra safety features, which are crafted for superior quality. In this article, you will get to know all its features, which are designed to enhance your thrill of driving the SUV at an affordable price. Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications: Exterior The Mahindra XUV 3XO exterior catches everyones attention in a blink. Its powerful stance signifies energy, style, and sportiness. In the front, the bold grille, sharp, sleek LED headlamps, and daytime running lights present a strong facade. The correctly designed hood, dynamic character lines along the sides, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels present a robust silhouette. At the rear, the innovative connected LED tail lamps, revamped bumper, and roof spoiler enhance its overall aesthetic. With a ground clearance of 201 mm, it triumphs in navigating challenging terrains. Overall, the exterior design depicts that the Mahindra XUV 3XO is well-proportioned. The distinct sportiness makes it ideal for daily commuting or thrilling adventures. Visit your Mahindra Automotive showroom Srikakulam to experience a test drive today. XUV 3XO Interior The interior is carefully designed on a wheelbase of 2,600 mm and measures 3,990(L)x1,821(W)x1,647(H) mm3. As a result, it offers plenty of room for five people, assuring ample legroom and headroom for free activity. The dashboard design is sleek and modern. It is enriched with soft-touch materials and accented by metallic details. The seats are wrapped in leatherette and high-quality fabric to your preference. The sunroof invites fresh air and light, creating a refreshing ambience. Dual 26.03 cm HD infotainment and digital displays provide amusement and essential driving information. The dual-tone interior and the Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system deliver an immersive audio experience, ideal for driving. In addition, the 364-litre* cargo capacity is perfect for adjusting all your luggage. Technology and Comfort The compact SUV crossover boasts an array of advanced tech-savvy features created to make every trip enjoyable. Its 26.03 cm touchscreen infotainment system is equipped with AdrenoX linked vehicle technology, providing effortless access to navigation, music, vehicle details, and remote capabilities. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features Apple CarPlay and Android Auto to connect a smartphone and use its apps. It has a fully digital instrument panel that allows for a personalised display. Additional amenities include dual-zone climate control, wireless charging, a high-end Harman Kardon sound system, as well as electric parking brakes and auto hold functions. Mahindras commitment to comfort is evident with the intelligent keyless entry, numerous USB ports, and powered adjustments for the drivers seat. XUV 3XO Performance & Mileage The vehicle offers an array of engine choices that connect various individuals across India. Customers can select from 1) A 1.2-litre mStallion TCMPFi & TGDi turbo-petrol engine boasting multipoint injection, producing roughly 82-96 kW power and 230 Nm of torque, or 2) a 1.5-litre Turbo diesel with CRDi engine providing about 85.8 kW and 300 Nm of torque. In-depth Specification Breakdown The Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications offer a sense of driving in harmony, either on a business trip or on a long journey with friends or family. This subcompact crossover SUV quickly became a travel companion for countless people after its launch. It is powerful, modern, and packed with everything you desire in an SUV. It has spacious seating, robust performance, entertainment options with signature Mahindra safety features, which are crafted for superior quality. In this article, you will get to know all its features, which are designed to enhance your thrill of driving the SUV at an affordable price. Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications: Exterior The Mahindra XUV 3XO exterior catches everyones attention in a blink. Its powerful stance signifies energy, style, and sportiness. In the front, the bold grille, sharp, sleek LED headlamps, and daytime running lights present a strong facade. The correctly designed hood, dynamic character lines along the sides, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels present a robust silhouette. At the rear, the innovative connected LED tail lamps, revamped bumper, and roof spoiler enhance its overall aesthetic. With a ground clearance of 201 mm, it triumphs in navigating challenging terrains. Overall, the exterior design depicts that the Mahindra XUV 3XO is well-proportioned. The distinct sportiness makes it ideal for daily commuting or thrilling adventures. Visit your Mahindra Automotive showroom Srikakulam to experience a test drive today. XUV 3XO Interior The interior is carefully designed on a wheelbase of 2,600 mm and measures 3,990(L)x1,821(W)x1,647(H) mm3. As a result, it offers plenty of room for five people, assuring ample legroom and headroom for free activity. The dashboard design is sleek and modern. It is enriched with soft-touch materials and accented by metallic details. The seats are wrapped in leatherette and high-quality fabric to your preference. The sunroof invites fresh air and light, creating a refreshing ambience. Dual 26.03 cm HD infotainment and digital displays provide amusement and essential driving information. The dual-tone interior and the Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system deliver an immersive audio experience, ideal for driving. In addition, the 364-litre* cargo capacity is perfect for adjusting all your luggage. Technology and Comfort The compact SUV crossover boasts an array of advanced tech-savvy features created to make every trip enjoyable. Its 26.03 cm touchscreen infotainment system is equipped with AdrenoX linked vehicle technology, providing effortless access to navigation, music, vehicle details, and remote capabilities. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features Apple CarPlay and Android Auto to connect a smartphone and use its apps. It has a fully digital instrument panel that allows for a personalised display. Additional amenities include dual-zone climate control, wireless charging, a high-end Harman Kardon sound system, as well as electric parking brakes and auto hold functions. Mahindras commitment to comfort is evident with the intelligent keyless entry, numerous USB ports, and powered adjustments for the drivers seat. XUV 3XO Performance & Mileage The vehicle offers an array of engine choices that connect various individuals across India. Customers can select from 1) A 1.2-litre mStallion TCMPFi & TGDi turbo-petrol engine boasting multipoint injection, producing roughly 82-96 kW power and 230 Nm of torque, or 2) a 1.5-litre Turbo diesel with CRDi engine providing about 85.8 kW and 300 Nm of torque. This subcompact crossover SUV quickly became a travel companion for countless people after its launch. It is powerful, modern, and packed with everything you desire in an SUV. It has spacious seating, robust performance, entertainment options with signature Mahindra safety features, which are crafted for superior quality. In this article, you will get to know all its features, which are designed to enhance your thrill of driving the SUV at an affordable price. Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications: Exterior The Mahindra XUV 3XO exterior catches everyones attention in a blink. Its powerful stance signifies energy, style, and sportiness. In the front, the bold grille, sharp, sleek LED headlamps, and daytime running lights present a strong facade. The correctly designed hood, dynamic character lines along the sides, and 17-inch diamond-cut alloy wheels present a robust silhouette. At the rear, the innovative connected LED tail lamps, revamped bumper, and roof spoiler enhance its overall aesthetic. With a ground clearance of 201 mm, it triumphs in navigating challenging terrains. Overall, the exterior design depicts that the Mahindra XUV 3XO is well-proportioned. XUV 3XO Interior The interior is carefully designed on a wheelbase of 2,600 mm and measures 3,990(L)x1,821(W)x1,647(H) mm3. As a result, it offers plenty of room for five people, assuring ample legroom and headroom for free activity. The dashboard design is sleek and modern. It is enriched with soft-touch materials and accented by metallic details. The seats are wrapped in leatherette and high-quality fabric to your preference. The sunroof invites fresh air and light, creating a refreshing ambience. Dual 26.03 cm HD infotainment and digital displays provide amusement and essential driving information. The dual-tone interior and the Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system deliver an immersive audio experience, ideal for driving. In addition, the 364-litre* cargo capacity is perfect for adjusting all your luggage. Technology and Comfort The compact SUV crossover boasts an array of advanced tech-savvy features created to make every trip enjoyable. Its 26.03 cm touchscreen infotainment system is equipped with AdrenoX linked vehicle technology, providing effortless access to navigation, music, vehicle details, and remote capabilities. The Mahindra XUV 3XO features Apple CarPlay and Android Auto to connect a smartphone and use its apps. It has a fully digital instrument panel that allows for a personalised display. Additional amenities include dual-zone climate control, wireless charging, a high-end Harman Kardon sound system, as well as electric parking brakes and auto hold functions. Mahindras commitment to comfort is evident with the intelligent keyless entry, numerous USB ports, and powered adjustments for the drivers seat. XUV 3XO Performance & Mileage The vehicle offers an array of engine choices that connect various individuals across India. 📊 COMPREHENSIVE Mahindra XUV 3XO Features ANALYSIS REPORT

🎯 Executive Summary

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is a compact SUV that offers a blend of style, comfort, and technology. Key features include its modern design, comfortable interiors, advanced technology, and safety features. The vehicle is available in multiple variants with both petrol and diesel engine options.

🔍 Market Landscape Overview

The Mahindra XUV 3XO competes in the compact SUV segment against rivals such as Tata Nexon, Hyundai Venue, and Maruti Suzuki Brezza. It aims to provide a fresh look with updated features and comfort.

💺 Comfort and Interior Features

The interior of the Mahindra XUV 3XO is designed for comfort and sophistication. Key features include:

  • Skyroof: Offers an open and airy feel to the cabin.
  • Soft-touch leatherette: Used on door trims and dashboard for a premium feel.
  • Premium leatherette seats: Provide comfortable seating.
  • Cooled glovebox with illumination: Keeps items cool and easily accessible.
  • Passive keyless entry: Adds convenience for the driver.
  • Front armrest with storage: Offers additional storage space.
  • Console with cup holder: Provides convenience for beverages.

📱 Technology and Connectivity

The Mahindra XUV 3XO is equipped with several smart connectivity and technology features:

  • Harman Kardon 7-speaker audio system: Provides an immersive audio experience.
  • High-definition touchscreen system: For infotainment and navigation.
  • Built-in Amazon Alexa: For entertainment and voice control.
  • ADRENOX Connect technology: Allows control of car functions via smartphone.
  • 10.25-inch infotainment display: Paired with a 10.25-inch digital instrument cluster.
  • Wireless charging: Adds convenience for charging devices.

🛡️ Safety Features

The Mahindra XUV 3XO prioritizes safety with the following features:

  • Six airbags: For enhanced protection.
  • Five-star Global NCAP safety rating: Ensures high safety standards.
  • ABS with EBD: Enhances braking performance.
  • Electronic stability control: Provides stability during driving.
  • Tyre pressure monitoring: Alerts the driver of low tyre pressure.
  • Level 2 ADAS: Includes features like forward collision warning and adaptive cruise control.

🚗 Exterior Design

The Mahindra XUV 3XO features a modern and athletic exterior design:

  • Chrome accents: On the grille and headlamp finish.
  • Projector headlamps with LED DRLs: Enhances visibility and aesthetics.
  • Diamond-cut alloy wheels: Adds a premium feel to the vehicle.
  • Roof rails & spoilers: Gloss-black roof rails and a sleek spoiler.
